reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is an amazing professor! Her lectures are clear, engaging, and she always encourages class participation.

reviews.subject: Advanced Calculus
reviews.review: The content is challenging, but Prof. Smith explains complex topics in a simple way. However, the exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is knowledgeable, but her lectures can be hard to follow. Be prepared to study a lot on your own.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Prof. Brown has a lot of knowledge, but his lectures are very monotonous. It’s easy to lose focus.

reviews.subject: Sociology 101
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is fantastic! She is approachable and makes sociology very interesting with real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Physics II
reviews.review: Prof. Miller is good at explaining concepts, but the pace of the class is fast. Pay close attention to the problem sets.

reviews.subject: Literary Analysis
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor is a great professor. She encourages deep thinking and class discussions are very insightful.

reviews.subject: Economics 101
reviews.review: Prof. Moore is decent, but his lectures can be a bit dry. The exams are fair, but you need to keep up with the readings.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is very knowledgeable and passionate about genetics. Her exams are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Lewis is hard to follow, and his grading criteria are unclear. The lectures are not very engaging.

reviews.subject: Microbiology
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is an excellent professor. She makes complex topics easy to understand and is always available for help.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Young is great at explaining statistics, but the homework can be overwhelming. Attend office hours if you need help.

reviews.subject: Ethics
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is an outstanding professor. She encourages critical thinking and class debates are very engaging.

reviews.subject: Computer Science 101
reviews.review: Prof. White is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be disorganized. The assignments are helpful for understanding the material.

reviews.subject: Human Anatomy
reviews.review: Dr. Green is very thorough in her teaching. The labs are difficult but rewarding. Study consistently.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: Prof. Hall’s lectures are hard to follow, and his exams are tricky. Be prepared to do a lot of self-study.

reviews.subject: Biochemistry
reviews.review: Dr. King is a fantastic professor. Her lectures are clear, and she is always willing to help outside of class.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: Prof. Wright is engaging and makes philosophy interesting. However, his grading is strict.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Scott is knowledgeable, but her lectures can be dry. The course content is interesting but requires a lot of memorization.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Sociology
reviews.review: Prof. Adams knows his material, but his lectures are very dull. The exams are tough and require a lot of reading.
